channel.title: PerryTinsley Plus Podcast
channel.description: IT’S NEVER TOO LATE! Getting fit and healthy may seem like something that was possible when you were younger. Not true! If you read my story you know how it’s possible to make changes at any age. These podcasts cover topics that helped me succeed with P90 and P90X. The PLUS part of the podcast will poke fun at fitness, talk about eating and diet, other Million Dollar Body programs and many things regarding overall health and well-being! Enjoy these video podcasts. Perry Tinsley www.perrytinsley.com
channel.itunes:author: Perry Tinsley

item.title: PerryTinsley Plus July 28, 2007 (Episode 17)
item.description: Name Change Notice! P90X Plus Podcast will be changing it’s name soon. Most likely to PerryTinsley Plus Podcast. Million Dollar Body has told me great news about additions to their P90X product and they are planning to use “Plus” in their product title. So, I am more than happy to change the title of this podcast and release the domain name. You will be able to subscribe to the podcast through perrytinsley.com

So, I am more than happy to change the title of this podcast and release the domain name. You will be able to subscribe to the podcast through perrytinsley.com

item.title: P90X Plus July 28, 2007 (Episode 16)
item.description: Special Guest: Melanie Bolen - MDB Success Story, chats with me about Million Dollar Body’s Super Saturday Event in Chicago, her success story, coaching and becoming a certified trainer! The next Podcast (episode 17) is information about some upcoming changes to future podcasts.

item.title: P90X Plus July 21, 2007 (Episode 15)
item.description: Modify and Intensify! The workouts in P90X always show different ways to alter exercises. Back in 2006 I was put out of commission for several weeks that eventually led to a diagnosis of degenerative disc disease. I needed to change the way I did certain exercises. This podcast features some of the ways I modify and intensify the exercises in P90X so that I can continue to be in the best shape of my life!

item.title: P90X Plus July 14, 2007 (Episode 14)
item.description: Another Special Guest! This time it’s Robyn (robyn6002) from Boston, Massachusetts . Robyn has had amazing success with P90X and she shares discusses routines of “fitness past” and how the P90X Nutrition Guide taught her to eat better. She will no doubt be a Million Dollar Body Success Story given her fitness achievements and body of a twenty year old!

item.title: P90X Plus July 07, 2007 (Episode 13)
item.description: It’s Day 90 for the P90X Plus Podcast! And we have a very special guest on this show to celebrate it! Million Dollar Body Coach and BeachBody Success Story, Ronda Hendrix, chats with us on P90X Plus! She tells about her weight challenges of the past, her success with MDB fitness products, and shares her fitness and health knowledge she has gained over the past fews. Ronda is my MDB Coach!

item.title: P90X Plus June 30, 2007 (Episode 12)
item.description: Have a Fit Day! An online tool that helped me besides the great tools offered at the Million Dollar Body and BeachBody web sites! Fitday.com

item.title: P90X Plus June 23, 2007 (Episode 11)
item.description: Join the Club! The Million Dollar Body Club has lots of great fitness tool and access to VIP chats with MDB’s top fitness experts! That’s worth the price of less than a Starbucks a week in itself! Plus there’s so much more and a chance to win up to $250,000 just by submitting your transformation story no matter what level or stage you are at in your fitness journey. Now that’s motivation! You can become a CLUB MEMBER by clicking the blue JOIN THE CLUB button below!

item.title: P90X Plus June 16, 2007 (Episode 10)
item.description: Fitness Success comes when you put YOU first. Then the important things in your life become more enjoyable, doable and livable! So, how did I put ME first to get through those first 90 days? Happy Father’s Day to those Dads out there. I hope you’re getting in shape to live a happy, healthy life with the ones you love.
item.itunes:author: Perry Tinsley

item.title: P90X Plus June 09, 2007 (Episode 9)
item.description: More “Nice to have” fitness tools to maximize your results. Some are obvious, others, you may have never thought of using. The heart rate monitor, the mirror and the video camera. And maybe even a cell phone? Obvious to some is the heart rate monitor. “Check your heart rate and stay in the zone!” A Mirror? Yep, Mirror Mirror on the wall am I using good form at all? The video camera. Not just for recording and submitting your success story to win big money at Million Dollar Body, but an excellent tool for analyzing each exercise to make sure you are getting the best results! I have already had several people give me tips for better form after they have seen my videos! NICE to have so many coaches!

item.title: P90X Plus June 02, 2007 (Episode 8)
item.description: Supplements: Let’s try not to get too confused! There are lots of options out there. Here’s what I am content with and what I take daily.

item.title: P90X Plus May 26, 2007 (Episode 7)
item.description: Food: Fuel for the Body or Flab for the Belly? Check out Michi’s Ladder. It simplifies food choices. Click Play the Game, sign up for FREE and choose Michi’s Ladder on your own personal page!. Become a Million Dollar Body Club member for less than a Starbucks a week! You’ll get access to great tools, a menu planner and the chance to win up to $10,000 in any given month! Better yet, you might win $250,000 at the end of the year just by submitting your success story!! Click on Join the Club at the bottom of my page!

item.title: P90X Plus May 19, 2007 (Episode 6)
item.description: Pull-ups. I used to think there were only pull-ups and chin-ups. WRONG! These P90X-ercises are challenging and not found in any of the other Million Dollar Body programs. Get that back ripped! Thinking of doing P90X? Take the P90X fit test here. Join our virtual workout room and fitness community for free and win up to $1000 a day just by working out and talking with like-minded people! Click Play the Game to sign up!

item.title: P90X Plus May 12, 2007 (Episode 5)
item.description: Finally! P90X Specific workouts! This week: Push-ups. P90X has a variety of them. More than I ever knew that were out there. This makes me think there are even more knocking at the fitness door (possibly in a P90 Double X program?). Now that would scare me! See how P90X really works the chest (among other things) in this episode. Think you might be interested in trying P90X? Try the P90X fit test here and see how you do. You might be ready today! Join our virtual workout room and fitness community for free and win up to $1000 a day just by working out and talking with like-minded people! Click Play the Game to sign up!

item.title: P90X Plus May 05, 2007 (Episode 4)
item.description: Eating plans. Whatever program you’ve selected, follow the eating plan as designed. Over time you can tailor your diet to meet your needs. This episode shares what seems to work for me and discoveries I’ve learned over time. Check out Michi’s Ladder for clean eating!
